nodes.text: Osted Picutorion was a man, who lived during the time of the Galactic Republic.

Picutorion was a warlord and in 553 BBY, he married Farasa Anturi, a deranged princess from the aristocratic House Anturi, which was based in the Senex sector. The House was renamed "House Picutorion" and Pictorion became involved in a conflict with two rival Senex houses, House Vandron and House Petro, in what became known as the Crimson Days. Picutorian defeated the combined Vandron and Petro forces, then freed the Hutlarians from servitude to the Senex lords and occupied the planet Karfeddion. The conflict was ended by the Third Nantama Synod, which accepted Picutorion's marriage.
